title: Say Goodnight to the Bad Guys
description: Who needs vampires...zombies...or werewolves...?The scariest, most horrifying monster is man, and in Say Goodnight to the Bad Guy... you will discover the depths of depravity that can be reached. These stories will have you watching over your shoulder or quickening your step as you cross that dark parking lot at night after work. To twist the knife a little deeper....these stories also work to shatter the myth that 'Good always triumphs in the end'. Don't look for any happy endings here...Sometimes, the Bad Guy wins.
author: T.W. Brown
